purpose: To help individuals prepare for system design interviews by breaking down complex systems into understandable components.
principle: Utilizes visual aids and simplified language to explain system design principles and architectures.
reusability: Content can be reused for educational purposes, interview preparation, and as reference material for understanding system design concepts.
limitations: Primarily focused on system design interviews; may not cover advanced or niche system design topics.
name: system-design-101
description: Explain complex systems using visuals and simple terms. Help you prepare for system design interviews.
highlight: Simplifies complex system design concepts using visuals and straightforward explanations.
